description: Crypto Open House is an all-day networking hub built for institutions, foundations, and VCs attending Consensus Hong Kong, located just steps away from the main conference venue. Designed for effortless drop-ins throughout the day, it gathers high-profile decision-makers from across the crypto ecosystem in a relaxed yet vibrant setting with great food and drinks. Here, off stage conversations happen naturally offering rare access to the people shaping the market, space to explore new opportunities, and a chance to step away from the noise and connect with the right crowd in an atmosphere that feels both exclusive and genuinely enjoyable. Date & Time: Feb 11, 2026. 11:00 - 18:00 HKT Venue: Frites Belgium on Tap at HKCEC There are several Frites Belgium on Tap in HK. Please refer to the Google Map! Event Agenda 11:00 AM - 2:00 PM Welcome & Check-in Guest arrival Welcome drinks Informal networking begins 2:00 PM - 2:30 PM Welcome Remarks from Co-hosts Opening Speech by Presto Speaking Session by TBD 2:30 PM - 6:00 PM Open Networking & Meeting Hub Gourmet bites and premium drinks Free-flow networking with industry leaders Exclusive meeting area for in-depth discussions Presto Presto is an algorithmic trading and financial services firm built on a foundation of quantitative research and engineering. Our core strength lies in combining engineering, mathematics, and science to navigate both digital asset and traditional equity markets with precision. https:/...
